name: @kindfi/indexer
description: SubQL Indexer to process all userbase in the kindfi platform blockchain activity and contributions, to push it to the off-chain data for his cosumption.

scripts.dev: subql codegen && subql build && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up --remove-orphans
scripts.build:develop: NODE_ENV=develop subql codegen && NODE_ENV=develop subql build

author: kindfi-org
